title: AI Product Development Workflow Cheat Code
summary: Step-by-step workflow for building applications using AI tools: ChatGPT for ideation, Claude for prototyping, and v0.dev/lovable.dev for implementation.
key_points: Start with ChatGPT for voice-to-text ideation and business coaching
Use ChatGPT to define problems, customers, and create foundation documents
Gather inspiration from existing sites (screenshots, HTML/CSS)
Use Claude Artifacts to create SVG/HTML wireframes and mockups
Generate Mermaid diagrams for application flow architecture
Input everything into v0.dev or lovable.dev for frontend implementation
hooks: I'm gonna give you the cheat code for AI product development
You want to build an application or website? Here's the workflow
ChatGPT has the best voice-to-text of all chatbots
Claude artifacts can render what this looks like before you code anything
quotable_moments: You're gonna talk to ChatGPT as if you were explaining your idea to anyone
Claude artifacts is gonna render it. It's really good if you do it in SVG or basic HTML
Do not start having it code up javascript and all this stuff. Have to do it in a basic SVG
Dump all those documents in there and watch some of the magic happen
review_notes: High-quality actionable content about AI development workflow. Clear step-by-step process with specific tool recommendations. Great for technical audience.
